Privacy Policy


Agrove has created the Agrove application as a free application. This SERVICE is provided free of charge by Agrove and is intended to be used as is. This page is used to inform visitors about our policies for the collection, use and disclosure of personal information if anyone decides to use our service. If you choose to use our service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in connection with this policy. The personal information we collect is used to provide and improve the service. We will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this privacy policy. The terms used in this privacy policy have the same meaning as in our terms and conditions, which is accessible to Agrove, unless otherwise specified in this privacy policy. Each user can contact us at contact@agrove.fr to delete all data collected by Agrove applications. 
ot


Collection and use of information


 For a better experience, when using our service, we may ask you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information, including but not limited to, the use of the camera allows the user to take a photo of himself in the profile page and also allows him to add photos of the vegetable garden in the My vegetable garden page. The user's gps position is used to fill in the address field, but also to get a more accurate rendering of the average temperature in the user's city when viewing climate parameters. The information we request will be kept by us and used as described in this privacy policy.


Log data


We would like to inform you that whenever you use our service, if there is an error in the application, we collect data and information (through third party products) on your phone called Log Data. This connection data may include information such as your device's IP address, device name, operating system version, application configuration when using our service, the time and date of your use of the service and other statistics. 
ot


Cookies


Cookies are files containing a small amount of data which are generally used as anonymous unique identifiers. They are sent to your browser by the websites you visit and are stored in the internal memory of your device. This service does not explicitly use these cookies. However, the application may use code from third parties and libraries that use cookies to collect information and improve their services. You have the option of accepting or rejecting these cookies and knowing when a cookie is sent to your device. If you choose to refuse our cookies, you may not be able to use certain parts of this service. 
ot


Service providers

We may employ companies and third parties for the following reasons: To facilitate our service; To provide the service on our behalf; to provide services related to the service; or To help us analyze the use of our service. We want to inform users of this Service that these third parties have access to your personal information. The reason is to perform the tasks assigned to them on our behalf. However, they are required not to disclose or use the information for any other purpose. 


Security


We appreciate the trust you place in us by providing us with your personal information, which is why we try to use commercially acceptable means to protect it. But remember that no method of transmission over the Internet or of electronic storage is 100 %secure and reliable, and we cannot guarantee its absolute security. Links to other sites This service may contain links to other sites. If you click on a third–party link, you will be directed to that site. Note that these external sites are not managed by us. Therefore, we strongly advise you to review the privacy policy of these sites. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies or practices of any third party sites or services. 
ot


Protection of children's privacy


These services are not intended for people under the age of 3. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children under the age of 3. In the event that we discover that a child under the age of 3 has provided us with personal information, we immediately delete it from our servers. If you are a parent or guardian and know that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us so that we can take appropriate action. Changes to this privacy policy We may update our privacy policy from time to time. We therefore advise you to consult this page regularly to take note of any changes. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new privacy policy on this page. This policy is in effect from 2020–09-23 


Contact


If you have any questions or suggestions regarding our privacy policy, please do not hesitate to contact us at contact@agrove.fr.

Classic vegetable garden Connected vegetable garden kits Agrove vegetable garden In a square, in a pot or in a planter Choose a type of vegetable garden: Which agrove vegetable garden kit do
you want to add? To validate Sunlight cancel add Beginner How to apply to join a team? Why form a team of gardeners? Here, I invite persons who garden with me in this vegetable garden ! To manage the garden with ease! All members of a team have access to the same features.

As soon as one of them completes a mission, the others are informed by a notification. People who have access to the QR Code of your connected vegetable garden can request to join your team.

They just need to scan the QR Code with their Agrove app since adding a vegetable garden .

To no longer receive add requests, go to the settings, at the top right of this screen. Well done! All conditions are good to ensure your crops grow!
You will receive alerts here if something goes wrong.

Charge the battery Place the solar panel in a brighter environment or recharge the battery via an AC outlet Not yet! It's done!
The earth is too dry! Check that the water level in the tank is sufficient and that your solar panel is sunny during the day. Water your plants so that they do not die and replace the product by facilitating the reset button. Water is not flowing. Water is flowing.
The temperature is approaching 0°C There is a risk of freezing. Protect your plants if you can and empty the water from the tank. Freezing can kill your most fragile plants and damage the pump. It's done! Not yet.
Fill 
the tank. The water level in the tank is too low, remember to add more to the maximum. It's done! The vegetable garden has no water Row
The sensor has not been sending data for 24 hours The sensor is no longer sending data. Press the reset button.
Define Ok The last setting failed. Your LoRa connection is probably at fault. Try again
🚨 Low battery! Be sure to orient the solar panel correctly.
💧 Soil humidity is too low! Your soil is too dry. Check that the sprinkler system is working properly. In case of problem you can water directly yourself.
🚰 The tank is almost empty! Fill your tank as soon as possible
⚠ Warning A problem has been detected with the sensors
